StructuredXMLResume.Objective:
Outgoing and detail-oriented, proficient at building and maintaining professional relationships. I believe in ensuring transparency, accountability, performance efforts by being an effective interface that aids business and technology for decision making.
Currently working as a Sr. Engineering Manager, where I am responsible for 50 members' team driving effort towards end to end Product Development, Road Map Delivery from Planning till Post production.
Being a Senior Leadership Team (SLT), my main focus areas are Strategic Planning, Team Management, Relationship Management, Product Development, Risk and Control with Production support.
Having hands-on experience in Agile with Scrum and Kanban, Waterfall, and Iterative in SDLC model. I am also responsible for the DevOps, and Agile delivery with all required automated Tools and Technologies.

PositionHistory.Title: Delivery Head
PositionHistory.Description: * Involved in Global Product Technology Budgeting and in Key Decisions for India and SEA region * Define and manage the roadmap, setting and continuously managing the right expectations with all relevant stakeholders including the senior leadership team * Achieved effective deliveries by forming DevOps, Strong customer focus, results driven and team oriented * Identifies process improvements and communicates them to the PMO Head and Architects programs * Ensured project outputs are consistent, high-quality on time and within budget to all business objectives

JobCategory.CategoryCode: Information Technology → Operations, Monitoring and Software Management
JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 27% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Manager
PositionHistory.Description: * Perform analysis that leads to continuous improvement and transformational projects for the business * Partnered with appropriate functional leaders to manage resources for projects * Supported assignments outside of new product development as required and worked with Cross Functional Teams * Responsible for the oversight of the Project Management Office, Change management, Production Support/Maintenance, Database Administration and Release Management * Oversee team's activities to provide impact assessment and subject knowledge, Drive partnerships, joint GTM models with key partners to drive scale in the marketplace

PositionHistory.Title: Manager
PositionHistory.Description: * Responsible for Product, and IT portfolios which includes Applications, Databases, Release and Infrastructure Management * Responsible for the overall performance, availability and optimization of virtualized environments, servers, networks etc. * Proactively evaluate servers and identifying for reduction, consolidation and virtualization. * Manage Incidents and Problems with regards to Application and DC. * Ensure compliance with patch management policy.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 75% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Application Support / Team Leader
PositionHistory.Description: * Work with business analysts and product owners to understand the requirements, use cases as part of the development team. * Design and Develop the core logic with required validations using HTML, JQuery, and C#.Net. * Develop the Data access layer with ADO.Net with SQL 2008R2 with a database as backend.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 100% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Support Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: * Incident Management and Problem Management * Develop basic software tools like system configuration management, test enabling modules * SQL SERVER

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 92% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Engineer Support
PositionHistory.Description: * Installing, configuring, troubleshooting, and maintaining server equipment, switches, routers, backup devices, RAID devices, and software Maintaining Call desk * Responsible for Installing and managing HP, IBM servers, Laptops, desktops and high end printers for large organization with more than 3000+ employees

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 50% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Customer Support Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: * IT Support, Network printers, Antivirus cleaning. Maintained zero network downtime. * Assisted end users with problem relating to network, network printing, desktop, software installation, configuration, LAN and WAN.

JobCategory.Comments: Administrative or Clerical describes 80% of this job

Degree.Comments:
Examination Year Institute Diploma 1996 DB Jain College - Electronics and Communication Engineering
PROJECTS and PRODUCTS Deliverables Product Development and Expansion * Upgraded the HCM, Payroll product to Cloud based version without impacting 1500+ clients. * Release and Deploy Multi country solution catering India, Singapore, Philippines and other south-east countries like Maldives, Indonesia, SriLanka and Bangladesh with agreed Release Calendar. * Involved in releasing native mobile apps for both Android and iOS and also for PWS-Progressive Web App which serving almost 400,000 records with end to end Pay, Leave and Tax.
Key Deliverables * HCM India & SEA * AWS Transitions and Product version upgrades & migrations. * Standalone application to Cloud based application upgrade. * Payroll, Leave, T&A, Performance management with Comprehensive reimbursement claims. * Compliance management, statutory rules and end to end Employee Exit management system.
Domain Knowledge * India & SEA Payroll, HCM * Indian Stats and Regulatory rules with compliance Management. * Country specific deductions, law of land.

Achievement.Description: Product Expansion across South East Asia region (Worth: $ 25 M)
Product platform migration for South East Asia region around 1500+ clients with record size of 0.5 M
AWS Transition around 20 Applications with 5000 Live databases with record size of 0.5 M
Deployed Centralized MIS using analytics for business reporting
Data Center consolidation 12 locations to a single location
20% growth in efficiency through Automation Projects

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
RAMKAMAL AV Ramkamal.Agastyaraju@gmail.com +91-9677037747
OBJECTIVE Outgoing and detail-oriented, proficient at building and maintaining professional relationships. I believe in ensuring transparency, accountability, performance efforts by being an effective interface that aids business and technology for decision making.
Currently working as a Sr. Engineering Manager, where I am responsible for 50 members' team driving effort towards end to end Product Development, Road Map Delivery from Planning till Post production.
Being a Senior Leadership Team (SLT), my main focus areas are Strategic Planning, Team Management, Relationship Management, Product Development, Risk and Control with Production support.
Having hands-on experience in Agile with Scrum and Kanban, Waterfall, and Iterative in SDLC model. I am also responsible for the DevOps, and Agile delivery with all required automated Tools and Technologies.
Notable Accomplishments: • Product Expansion across South East Asia region (Worth: $ 25 M) • Product platform migration for South East Asia region around 1500+ clients with record size of 0.5 M • AWS Transition around 20 Applications with 5000 Live databases with record size of 0.5 M • Deployed Centralized MIS using analytics for business reporting • Data Center consolidation 12 locations to a single location • 20% growth in efficiency through Automation Projects
Employment History:
• ADP India PVT LTD [2005 to Present] - 14 Years • Vitage Infoservices Pvt Ltd [2003 to 2005] - 2 Years • Quantum International pvt ltd [2002 to 2003] - 1 Year • JVR Infotech Private Limited [1999 to 2002] - 3 Years
INDUSTRY EXPERIENCE EXPERIENCE - 04 ADP India Pvt Ltd (14 Years) Chennai 2015- Jan' 2019 Delivery Head * Involved in Global Product Technology Budgeting and in Key Decisions for India and SEA region * Define and manage the roadmap, setting and continuously managing the right expectations with all relevant stakeholders including the senior leadership team * Achieved effective deliveries by forming DevOps, Strong customer focus, results driven and team oriented * Identifies process improvements and communicates them to the PMO Head and Architects programs * Ensured project outputs are consistent, high-quality on time and within budget to all business objectives
2014-2015 Sr. Manager * Perform analysis that leads to continuous improvement and transformational projects for the business * Partnered with appropriate functional leaders to manage resources for projects * Supported assignments outside of new product development as required and worked with Cross Functional Teams * Responsible for the oversight of the Project Management Office, Change management, Production Support/Maintenance, Database Administration and Release Management * Oversee team's activities to provide impact assessment and subject knowledge, Drive partnerships, joint GTM models with key partners to drive scale in the marketplace
2012-2014 Manager * Responsible for Product, and IT portfolios which includes Applications, Databases, Release and Infrastructure Management * Responsible for the overall performance, availability and optimization of virtualized environments, servers, networks etc. * Proactively evaluate servers and identifying for reduction, consolidation and virtualization. * Manage Incidents and Problems with regards to Application and DC. * Ensure compliance with patch management policy.
2005-2012 Application Support / Team Leader * Work with business analysts and product owners to understand the requirements, use cases as part of the development team. * Design and Develop the core logic with required validations using HTML, JQuery, and C#.Net. * Develop the Data access layer with ADO.Net with SQL 2008R2 with a database as backend.
EXPERIENCE - 03 Vitage Infoservices Pvt Ltd Hyderabad 2003-2005 Sr. Support Engineer * Incident Management and Problem Management * Develop basic software tools like system configuration management, test enabling modules * SQL SERVER
EXPERIENCE - 02 Quantum International pvt ltd Hyderabad 2002-2003 Sr. Engineer Support * Installing, configuring, troubleshooting, and maintaining server equipment, switches, routers, backup devices, RAID devices, and software Maintaining Call desk * Responsible for Installing and managing HP, IBM servers, Laptops, desktops and high end printers for large organization with more than 3000+ employees
EXPERIENCE - 01 JVR Infotech Private Limited Hyderabad 1999-2002 Sr. Customer Support Engineer * IT Support, Network printers, Antivirus cleaning. Maintained zero network downtime. * Assisted end users with problem relating to network, network printing, desktop, software installation, configuration, LAN and WAN.
Skillset Descriptions and Details Analyzing and Documenting Skills * SLA Document has been updated with new client and country base aligned with team size to maximize NPS scores and ensured client retentions. * DR strategy documentations and updates made for easy disaster recovery plans for Business Continuity. * Process Asset Library updates made with required Change Management process of important documents for Testing, CRs and ACL forms. * Documents Repository has been maintained for historical project related documents to ensure smooth deliverables for any kind of projects with lessons learnt, checklist items prepared.
Application Development Skills * C#.Net, ASP.Net with SQL Server 2008R2 and 2014/16. * ADO.Net, Three Tier Architecture, and MVC * WCF, Open API and PWA, Progressive Web App Development. * HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, Angular.JS, PHP, REDIS and Mongo DB * Windows and Linux Operating Systems
DevOps Management Skills * TFS Build Agent, TFS Administration and Release Management. * BitBucket, Jenkins, TFS Build, TFS Source Code Repository. * CI and CD with TFS, Release Management Tool, Microsoft TFS 2015. * Defining Build pipelines for Internal Lower environments * Testing the Staging and Production environments with controls.
Problem Solving and Technical Support Skills * Lead Support Team with Different time zones of India and SEA with shift modeling. * Root Cause Analysis, Fish-bone, 5 Why Approach. * Incident Management and Problem Management. * Troubleshooting System and Application issues.
Change Management Skills * Change Management Support, Scope Vs Delivery Gap Metrics, JIRA, Rally, and TFS Burn down charts. * Plan, Schedule with Release Calendar and Resource allocation, WBS. * Iterative and Incremental release plans.
Tools Used * Visual Studio, TFS, BitBucket, JIRA * SSRS and SharePoint Administration * MS Project, Jenkins and Nagios, JFrog Artifactory, Rally and Ansible Basics * SQL Server 2008 R2, 2012 and 2014 * IIS 7/7.5/8.0, Apache an Tomcat
EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATION Examination Year Institute Diploma 1996 DB Jain College - Electronics and Communication Engineering
PROJECTS and PRODUCTS Deliverables
Product Development and Expansion * Upgraded the HCM, Payroll product to Cloud based version without impacting 1500+ clients. * Release and Deploy Multi country solution catering India, Singapore, Philippines and other south-east countries like Maldives, Indonesia, SriLanka and Bangladesh with agreed Release Calendar. * Involved in releasing native mobile apps for both Android and iOS and also for PWS-Progressive Web App which serving almost 400,000 records with end to end Pay, Leave and Tax.
Key Deliverables * HCM India & SEA * AWS Transitions and Product version upgrades & migrations. * Standalone application to Cloud based application upgrade. * Payroll, Leave, T&A, Performance management with Comprehensive reimbursement claims. * Compliance management, statutory rules and end to end Employee Exit management system.
Domain Knowledge * India & SEA Payroll, HCM * Indian Stats and Regulatory rules with compliance Management. * Country specific deductions, law of land.
PERSONAL DETAILS Date Of Birth 24th Dec, 1975 Nationality Indian Languages Known English - Full professional proficiency Telugu- Native or bilingual proficiency Hindi - Professional working proficiency Tamil - Professional working proficiency
Permanent Address Vanasthalipuram, Hyderabad Current Address West Mambalam, Chennai

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: The candidate's experience appears to be mostly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Database) and slightly concentrated in Marketing (mostly General). The candidate has 21 years of work experience, with 11 years of management experience, including a mid-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory:
The following management-related items were found: Application Support / Team Leader
Starting on 1/1/2014, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 2 years: Title: Sr. Manager Starting on 1/1/2012, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 3 years: Title: Manager Starting on 1/1/2005, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 8 years and 1 months: Title: Application Support / Team Leader
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:AttentionNeeded: ATTENTION: The candidate appears to have been in management in a past role (Sr. Manager) , but was not in management in the most recent role as for ADP India PVT LTD.

sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:302;] A first and last name was not found in the contact information. A resume should always include the candidate's first and last name.
[Sovren:311;] The resume contains a contact information section that is not the first section. A resume should always include the candidate's contact info at the top of the resume.
[Sovren:323;WORK HISTORY] The following section type appeared multiple times in the resume: WORK HISTORY (2 occurrences). Each section type should only appear once in a resume.
[Sovren:221;POS-1,POS-2,POS-3,POS-4] We could not find a job title for: POS-1, POS-2, POS-3, POS-4. Every position in a resume should have a job title.
[Sovren:222;POS-6,POS-7,POS-8] No employer name was found for: POS-6, POS-7, POS-8. Every position in a resume should have an employer name.

[Sovren:112;] The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'Skillset'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education.

[Sovren:151;4] The following section does not have the header on a separate line: 'Skillset'. Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.

sov:ResumeUserArea.sov:ParserConfigurationString: Coverage.MilitaryHistoryAndSecurityCredentials = True; Coverage.PatentsPublicationsAndSpeakingEvents = True; Coverage.PersonalAttributes = True; Coverage.Training = True; Culture.CountryCodeForUnitedKingdomIsUK = True; Culture.DefaultCountryCode = IN; Culture.DefaultCultureIsIndia = True; Culture.Language = English; Culture.PreferEnglishVersionIfTwoLanguagesInDocument = False; Data.UserDefinedParsing = False; OutputFormat.AssumeCompanyNameFromPrecedingJob = False; OutputFormat.ContactMethod.PackStyle = Split; OutputFormat.DateOutputStyle = ExplicitlyKnownDateInfoOnly; OutputFormat.NestJobsBasedOnDateRanges = True; OutputFormat.NormalizeRegions = False; OutputFormat.SkillsStyle = Default; OutputFormat.StripParsedDataFromPositionHistoryDescription = True; OutputFormat.TelcomNumber.Style = Raw; OutputFormat.XmlFormat = HrXmlResume25
